title: Michael Saylor Interview: Bitcoin Regulation, Volatility, and Market Structure
description:
Blockware Lead Insights Analyst Will Clemente, Blockware CEO Mason Jappa, and Microstrategy CEO Michael Saylor talk about Bitcoin regulation, volatility, market dynamics, and more for our weekly interview Podcast/YouTube channel series. Can now find our podcast on Spotify, Apple, and Google Podcasts as well!  

Michael's Twitter: twitter.com/saylor 

Microstrategy's website: microstrategy.com
dc:creator: Joe Burnett
